sourcesContent:
import { Card, ProgressBar, Stack, Button } from "react-bootstrap" import { currencyFormatter } from "../../utils" interface BudgetProps { name: string, amount: number, max: number } export default function BudgetCard( {name, amount, max}: BudgetProps) { return (
{name}
{currencyFormatter.format(amount)} / {currencyFormatter.format(max)}
) } function getColor(amount: number, max: number): string { if (amount < max) return "--bs-emphasis-color" return "--bs-danger" } function getVariant(amount: number, max: number): string { const ratio = amount / max if (ratio < 0.5) return "success" if (ratio < 0.8) return "warning" return "danger" }
